descriptionList: Contributing to TensorFlow Probability and working on probabilistic programming and deep learning in JAX
Worked on incorporating Bayesian nonparametric tree priors with VAEs. Paper accepted into AISTATS 2019. Mentored by Matthew Hoffman and Matthew Johnson
Designed and implemented an interactive machine learning algorithm for classification of low-frequency events in Amazonâ€™s marketplace. Built a UI using ReactJS

Ported a backend service from one machine learning model to a more accurate model
